title: Three Sinful Wishes
description: In hot and steamy Sedona, Arizona, three women are about to be granted their most intimate desires.  Dani, Bailey, and Kaya think they know what they want from life- success, independence, and a gorgeous man to share their beds-but when they perform an old wish-making ritual together, each of them gets a sinful surprise.  In these three interrelated love stories, these women discover that two is company...and three is even better.
author: R.G. Alexander
